org.epics.graphene

Class TemporalGraph2DRenderer<T extends TemporalGraph2DRendererUpdate>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.epics.graphene.TemporalGraph2DRenderer<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineTimeGraph2DRenderer

    public abstract class TemporalGraph2DRenderer<T extends TemporalGraph2DRendererUpdate>
extends Object
    The base class for all graph renderers.
    Author:
    carcassi

      • update

        public void update(T update)
        Applies the update to the renderer.

        When sub-classing, one should re-implement this method by first calling it and then applying all the updates specific to the sub-class.

        Parameters:
        update - the update to apply

      • newUpdate
